General.Name: Quinsam Capital Corporation
General.Description: Quinsam Capital Corporation operates as a investment and merchant banking firm in Canada. It primarily focuses on investment in technology, healthcare, mining and exploration, e-sports, and cannabis markets. The company's activities include acquisitions, advisory services, lending activities, and portfolio investments. Quinsam Capital Corporation was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 77 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1H1
